= Ezmath Documentation =

Ezmath is an open-source [http://flex.sourceforge.net/ Flex]-[http://www.gnu.org/software/bison/ Bison]-[http://www.php.net/ PHP] application that translate Ezmath syntax into LaTeX and let [http://www.mathjax.org/ MathJax] draw them on web.
